attributes.review: The app is absolutely horrible, unacceptable, and the website is the worst. I was completely fine before getting the app. As soon as I got the app, I got hit by a car, beat in the alley, and someone stole my identity and killed my children and parents. When I open the app, I start throwing up in my mouth a little bit because of the thought of all it has put me through. If I rated the app from 1-10, it would be a -6272829209273638829. I showed my friend this app and she jumped off a roof. Thatâ€™s how horrible it is.
